author: Anton Petrov
description:
Support this channel on Patreon to help me make this a full time job: https://www.patreon.com/whatdamath (Unreleased videos, extra footage, DMs, no ads)

Hello and welcome! My name is Anton and in this video, we will talk about a new study examining thioester world hypothesis and connecting it to the origin of RNA and early cells - the basis of abiogenesis
Links:

0:00 How did life actually start (abiogenesis)? 
0:59 History of biology - Darwin and Miller Urey 
2:01 Challenges of modern theories 
2:40 R
title: Major Breakthrough in Figuring Out How Life Started on Earth
